english_translation: Do not squeeze sourness and turn a pot of milk into street milk (ruin it);
Do not cut your nose in great anger.

kannada_original: ಸಟೆ ನುಡಿದು ಈ ಬದುಕ ಬರಿ ಜಟಿಲ ಮಾಡದಿರು;
english_transliteration: Saṭe nuḍidu ī baduk barī jaṭila māḍadiru;
english_translation: Do not make this life merely complicated by speaking falsehoods;
Forget the initial complication/hesitation – Muddu Rama.
